usefulItems: baking tray and paper, toothpick, oven
title: Tomato Risotto with Lemon Ricotta Stuffed Chicken Breast

ingredients.content: 40 g Parmesan cheese, cut in pieces
1 heaped tbsp vegetable stock paste, homemade
¼ tsp freshly ground black pepper

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper and set aside.
Place Parmesan cheese in mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place parsley, mint and lemon zest in mixing bowl then chop <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer half of the parsley-mint mixture to a bowl for garnish.
Add ricotta, salt and black pepper to remaining mixture in mixing bowl then mix <b>20 sec/speed 2<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Halve chicken breasts horizontally. Place one half of each of the chicken breasts in the prepared baking tray. Place approx. 1 tbsp ricotta mixture onto each, dividing equally between chicken breasts. Top each with the other half of the chicken breast and secure with toothpicks. Roast for 20 minutes (180°C). Meanwhile clean and dry mixing bowl, then continue with recipe.
Place shallot, garlic clove, parsley and olive oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add risotto rice and tomatoes then sauté without measuring cup <b>3 min/120°C//speed 1<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add white wine and cook without measuring cup <b>1 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Add water, vegetable stock paste, salt, black pepper and tomato purée. Scrape bottom of bowl with spatula to loosen rice and cook <b>12-13 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Add butter and reserved grated Parmesan cheese then stir using spatula. Allow to rest in mixing bowl for 2 minutes.
Garnish the stuffed chicken with reserved chopped parsley-mint mixture and serve with risotto immediately.
